title: shrI vaidyanAtham
sahitya:
shrI vaidyanAtham bhajAmi shritajana vandita bAlAmbikEsham


anupallavi

 dhavaLita vaidyanAtha kSEtram dayAsudhA sAgaram trinEtram 
avinAsha kaivalyAdi pradam Anandakara mUlAdi pradam


caraNam   dEvarAjAdi pUjita padam divyAmbara dhara guruguha mudam 
kavijanAdinuta sOmAskandam kamanIya nAdabindu kalAspadam
